connector.description: Connect to OPC UA servers using the binary protocol for acquiring telemetry data.

camel.source.endpoint.clientId.name: camel.source.endpoint.clientId
camel.source.endpoint.clientId.description: A virtual client id to force the creation of a new connection instance

camel.source.endpoint.discoveryEndpointS.name: camel.source.endpoint.discoveryEndpointSuffix
camel.source.endpoint.discoveryEndpointS.description: A suffix for endpoint URI when discovering

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.source.endpoint.allowedSecurityPol.name: camel.source.endpoint.allowedSecurityPolicies
camel.source.endpoint.allowedSecurityPol.description: A set of allowed security policy URIs. Default is to accept all and use the highest.

camel.source.endpoint.keyAlias.name: camel.source.endpoint.keyAlias
camel.source.endpoint.keyAlias.description: The name of the key in the keystore file

camel.source.endpoint.keyStoreUrl.name: camel.source.endpoint.keyStoreUrl
camel.source.endpoint.keyStoreUrl.description: The URL where the key should be loaded from

camel.source.endpoint.maxPendingPublishR.name: camel.source.endpoint.maxPendingPublishRequests
camel.source.endpoint.maxPendingPublishR.description: The maximum number of pending publish requests

camel.source.endpoint.maxResponseMessage.name: camel.source.endpoint.maxResponseMessageSize
camel.source.endpoint.maxResponseMessage.description: The maximum number of bytes a response message may have

camel.source.endpoint.overrideHost.name: camel.source.endpoint.overrideHost
camel.source.endpoint.overrideHost.description: Override the server reported endpoint host with the host from the endpoint URI.

camel.source.endpoint.requestedPublishin.name: camel.source.endpoint.requestedPublishingInterval
camel.source.endpoint.requestedPublishin.description: The requested publishing interval in milliseconds

camel.component.milo-client.clientId.name: camel.component.milo-client.clientId
camel.component.milo-client.clientId.description: A virtual client id to force the creation of a new connection instance

camel.component.milo-client.configuratio.name: camel.component.milo-client.configuration
camel.component.milo-client.configuratio.description: All default options for client configurations

camel.component.milo-client.discoveryEnd.name: camel.component.milo-client.discoveryEndpointSuffix
camel.component.milo-client.discoveryEnd.description: A suffix for endpoint URI when discovering

camel.component.milo-client.bridgeErrorH.name: camel.component.milo-client.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.milo-client.bridgeErrorH.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.milo-client.basicPropert.name: camel.component.milo-client.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.milo-client.basicPropert.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.milo-client.allowedSecur.name: camel.component.milo-client.allowedSecurityPolicies
camel.component.milo-client.allowedSecur.description: A set of allowed security policy URIs. Default is to accept all and use the highest.

camel.component.milo-client.keyAlias.name: camel.component.milo-client.keyAlias
camel.component.milo-client.keyAlias.description: The name of the key in the keystore file

camel.component.milo-client.keyStoreUrl.name: camel.component.milo-client.keyStoreUrl
camel.component.milo-client.keyStoreUrl.description: The URL where the key should be loaded from

camel.component.milo-client.maxPendingPu.name: camel.component.milo-client.maxPendingPublishRequests
camel.component.milo-client.maxPendingPu.description: The maximum number of pending publish requests

camel.component.milo-client.maxResponseM.name: camel.component.milo-client.maxResponseMessageSize
camel.component.milo-client.maxResponseM.description: The maximum number of bytes a response message may have

camel.component.milo-client.overrideHost.name: camel.component.milo-client.overrideHost
camel.component.milo-client.overrideHost.description: Override the server reported endpoint host with the host from the endpoint URI.

camel.component.milo-client.requestedPub.name: camel.component.milo-client.requestedPublishingInterval
camel.component.milo-client.requestedPub.description: The requested publishing interval in milliseconds
